# Class Graph

Represents a graph that can be executed.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

cleanupAllExecutions closeExecution destroy getGraphId start stopExecutor toJSON visualize

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new Graph(options: DeclarativeGraphOptions): [Graph]()

Creates a new Graph instance.

#### Parameters

    * options: DeclarativeGraphOptions

#### Returns [Graph]()




## Methods

### cleanupAllExecutions

  * cleanupAllExecutions(): void

Cleans up all active executions.

#### Returns void




### closeExecution

  * closeExecution(outputStream: number | [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)): void

Closes a specific execution.

#### Parameters

    * outputStream: number | [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)

Output stream of the execution to close

#### Returns void




### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this graph.

#### Returns void




### getGraphId

  * getGraphId(): string

Gets the unique identifier for this graph.

#### Returns string

The graph's unique ID




### start

  * start(input: any, executionId?: string): [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)

Executes the compiled graph with user context.

#### Parameters

    * input: any

Input data to execute the graph

    * `Optional`executionId: string

Unique identifier for this execution

#### Returns [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)

Promise resolving to the execution output stream

  * start(input: any, userContext?: [UserContext](./common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContext)): [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)

Executes the compiled graph with user context.

#### Parameters

    * input: any

Input data to execute the graph

    * `Optional`userContext: [UserContext](./common_data_types_external_user_context.UserContext)

User context for this execution

#### Returns [GraphOutputStream](./graph_GraphOutputStream.GraphOutputStream)

Promise resolving to the execution output stream




### stopExecutor

  * stopExecutor(): void

Stops the graph executor.

#### Returns void




### toJSON

  * toJSON(): string

Returns the JSON configuration of the graph.

#### Returns string

The JSON configuration of the graph




### visualize

  * visualize(path: string): Promise<void>

Visualizes the compiled graph and saves the visualization to a file.

#### Parameters

    * path: string

File path where the visualization will be saved

#### Returns Promise<void>
